body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is George Collins and the customer's name is Emily Carter.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is George Collins, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Emily! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm actually feeling a bit overwhelmed with all the motorcycle options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, it can be quite a lot to take in. If you don't mind, could I ask you for your email address so I can send you some recommendations?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that, Emily! Also, could you provide me with your zip code to better understand your area?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I appreciate the information. What kind of motorcycles are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something sporty but comfortable.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds exciting! I can definitely help you find something that fits those needs. Thank you for your time today, Emily. Have a great day!
